snippet: A deal has been reached for a 5,000-seat music hall and theater partly on the vacant site of a well-known terra cotta landmark, Brooklyn officials said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: A deal has been reached for a 5,000-seat music hall and theater partly on the vacant site of a well-known terra cotta landmark, Brooklyn officials said Wednesday.

headline.seo: Markowitz to Announce Deal for New Theater in Coney Island
headline.main: Next on the List for Coney Island: A New Theater
headline.print_headline: Next on the List for Coney Island: A New Theater
